head.title: Welcome to WSO2 Identity Server v3.2.0!

body.h1: WSO2 Identity Server : An open source Identity and Entitlement management server
body.h3: WSO2 Identity Server v3.2.0 Release Note
body.p: WSO2 Identity Server is an open source Identity and Entitlement management server having support for OpenID, Information Cards, XACML and SAML 2.0.
This is based on revolutionary the WSO2 Carbon framework, Middleware a la carte'.
All the major features have been developed as pluggable Carbon components.

ul.li: Various bug fixes and enhancements including architectural improvements to Apache Axis2, Apache Rampart, Apache Sandesha2 , WSO2 Carbon and other projects.
Claim based Security Token Service with SAML 1.1/SAML 2.0.
Extension points for SAML assertion handling.
Separable front-end and back-end - a single front-end server can be used to administer several back-end servers.
Information Cards provider supporting Managed Information Cards backed by user name / password and self-issued cards.
